settings.desc_detail: Measure from shoulder tip to cuff with a gentle bend in the arm.
Measure from shoulder tip to shoulder tip across the back.
Measure around the fullest part of your bust.
The natural waist is found by measuring the slimmmest part of the waist.
Measure from your natural waist line (centre front), going through your legs to your natural waist line at centre back.
Measure around the fullest part of your hip, normally 2-3cm below the natural waistline.
Measure from top of inside leg at crotch to ankle bone.
